entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023
